mapper.sql: SCHEDULEID, COURSENAME, VENUEID, COURSETYPE, COURSETEACHER, DURATION, CLASSROOM, STUDENTNUMBER, COURSECOLOR, COURSEDIFFICULTY, SUBSIDY, STUDENTLIMIT, EXTRAOPTION, STARTTIME, CREATEUSER, CREATEDATE, MODIFYUSER, MODIFYDATE, FLAG, ENDTIME, COURSEPHOTO, REMARK
mapper.insert: insert into yj_schedule (SCHEDULEID, COURSENAME, VENUEID, COURSETYPE, COURSETEACHER, DURATION, CLASSROOM, STUDENTNUMBER, COURSECOLOR, COURSEDIFFICULTY, SUBSIDY, STUDENTLIMIT, EXTRAOPTION, STARTTIME, CREATEUSER, CREATEDATE, MODIFYUSER, MODIFYDATE, FLAG, ENDTIME, COURSEPHOTO, REMARK) values (#{scheduleid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coursename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{venueid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coursetype,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{courseteacher,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{duration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{classroom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{studentnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{coursecolor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coursedifficulty,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{subsidy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{studentlimit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{extraoption,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{flag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{coursephoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into yj_schedule
SCHEDULEID,
COURSENAME,

FLAG,

COURSEPHOTO,
REMARK,

mapper.update:
update yj_schedule
COURSENAME = #{coursename,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VENUEID = #{venueid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COURSETYPE = #{coursetype,jdbcType=CHAR},
COURSETEACHER = #{courseteacher,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DURATION = #{duration,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CLASSROOM = #{classroom,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STUDENTNUMBER = #{studentnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER},
COURSECOLOR = #{coursecolor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COURSEDIFFICULTY = #{coursedifficulty,jdbcType=CHAR},
SUBSIDY = #{subsidy,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
STUDENTLIMIT = #{studentlimit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
EXTRAOPTION = #{extraoption,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STARTTIME = #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATEUSER = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATEDATE = #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFYUSER = #{modifyuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFYDATE = #{modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=CHAR},
ENDTIME = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
COURSEPHOTO = #{coursephoto,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where SCHEDULEID = #{scheduleid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update yj_schedule set COURSENAME = #{coursename,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VENUEID = #{venueid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COURSETYPE = #{coursetype,jdbcType=CHAR}, COURSETEACHER = #{courseteacher,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DURATION = #{duration,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CLASSROOM = #{classroom,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STUDENTNUMBER = #{studentnumber,jdbcType=INTEGER}, COURSECOLOR = #{coursecolor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COURSEDIFFICULTY = #{coursedifficulty,jdbcType=CHAR}, SUBSIDY = #{subsidy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STUDENTLIMIT = #{studentlimit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, EXTRAOPTION = #{extraoption,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STARTTIME = #{starttime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATEUSER = #{createuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATEDATE = #{createdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFYUSER = #{modifyuser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFYDATE = #{modifydate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=CHAR}, ENDTIME = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where SCHEDULEID = #{scheduleid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select A.*, count(1) over() as CNT, ceil(count(1) over()/#{pagesize}) as PAGE from( select s.scheduleid, s.coursename, d.label coursetype, u.username courseteacher, s.duration, c.classroomname classroom, s.studentnumber, s.coursecolor, s.coursedifficulty, s.subsidy, s.starttime, s.endtime, s.coursephoto, s.remark, v.venuename, #{starttime} startdate, #{endtime} enddate from yj_schedule s left join sys_user u on u.userid = s.courseteacher and u.flag = '0' left join sys_dict d on d.type = 'course_type' and d.key = s.coursetype and d.flag = '0' left join yj_classroom c on c.classroomid = s.classroom and c.flag = '0' left join yj_venue v on v.venueid = s.venueid and v.flag = '0' where s.flag = '0'
and s.coursename like concat('%',#{coursename},'%')
and s.starttime >= str_to_date(#{starttime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and s.endtime < str_to_date(#{endtime},'%Y-%m-%d')+1
order by starttime )A limit #{begin},#{end}
mapper.update: update yj_order set orderstatus = '2000' where scheduleid = #{scheduleid}
